natlang.rdg.documentplanner
Class StateTransformer

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.documentplanner.StateTransformer
public class StateTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

The StateTransformer decides how an internal state can be told best. It can combine a state with an action or convert the state into an adverb or a entirely different sentence

Constructor Summary
StateTransformer()
          Constructor - Initializes the lists of adverbs and sentences

transformState

public RSVertex transformState(PlotElement pe1,
                               PlotElement pe2)
Decides how a certain state and action can best be told, possibly by combining them into one node, otherwise connecting them (currently randomly)

Parameters:
pe1 - the state
pe2 - the action
Returns:
the state and action combined into one or connected by a rhetorical relation
